fulltext:

.NET Developer

TPHCM 
OBJECTIVE 
Excellent team player and content expert with in-depth knowledge of development tools and languages. 
Hopeful for a chance to apply 5 + years of experience in developing designs, code; debugging programs to 
real problems, and adding value to the business. 
Keep improving myself to pursue a successful career in software development where skills in coding, 
troubleshooting, and analyzing will be useful in the delivery of state-of-the-art software solutions. 
WORK EXPERIENCE

and maintain project.

new tech)
